verses.roman:
pūrvavat ratha-āge karilā nartana
herā-pañcamī-yātrā kailā daraśana

synonyms: pūrva-vat—as previously; ratha-āge—in front of the chariot; karilā nartana—performed dancing; herā-pañcamī-yātrā—the festival of Herā-pañcamī; kailā daraśana—He saw.
translation: As previously, He danced in front of the Jagannātha cart and observed the festival of Herā-pañcamī.
